    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Attack
    Represents an attack with a name and a power value.
    AttackButton
    Represents a button in the UI that, when clicked, performs an attack on an enemy using an associated Attack instance.
    AttackButtonsPanel
    Represents the panel that contains buttons for the player's attack actions.
    Battle
    This class manages the battle between player and an enemy, manages turns and shows results
    BattleCounter
    A class that keeps track of the number of battles.
    BattlePanel
    Represents the battle panel in the game interface.
    BattleTextArea
    Custom text area used to display battle-related information in the game.
    ButtonsAfterLostPanel
    Represents the panel that is displayed after the player loses a battle.
    ButtonsAfterWinPanel
    Represents the panel displayed after the player wins a battle.
    ChangeClassButton
    Represents a button in the UI that resets the battle counter and changes the screen to player selection.
    CreditsPanel
    Represents the credits panel in the game interface.
    Enemies
    Enumeration representing the different types of enemies in the game.
    Enemy
    Represents an enemy that automatically performs attacks on the player.
    EnemyFactory
    Interface for creating enemies in the game.
    EnemyType
    Enumeration representing the types of enemies in the game.
    Entity
    Abstract class representing an entity with stats, an attack list, and a unique identifier.
    EntityPanel
    Represents a panel that displays an entity (player or enemy) with their respective image.
    ESCKeyAction
     
    Game
    Manages the game logic, the player, creates battles and checks when has the game finished
    JsonMapper
    A utility class that deserializes a JSON file and maps its data to an entity object.
    Main
    Main class to start the game application.
    MainFrame
    The main window of the game, configured with a title, size, layout, and other settings.
    NextBattleButton
    Represents a button in the UI that starts the next battle and restores the player's health.
    PanelManager
    The PanelManager class is responsible for managing the different panels in the application's user interface.
    Player
    Represents a player character in the game.
    PlayerOptionPanel
    Represents a panel for displaying an option to select a player's class.
    PlayerSelectionPanel
    Represents the player selection panel in the game interface.
    PowerUpButton
    Represents a button in the UI that grants a power-up to a player's stat when clicked.
    RandomBossFactory
    Factory class for creating a random boss enemy.
    RandomDifficultEnemyFactory
    Factory class for creating a random difficult enemy.
    RandomEnemyFactory
    Factory class for creating a random easy enemy.
    RestartGameButton
    Represents a button in the UI that restarts the game and resets the player's progress when clicked.
    SelectClassButton
    Represents a button in the UI that allows the user to select a player class.
    Settings
    This class manages the global configuration of the game.
    ShowCreditsButton
    Represents a button in the UI that allows the user to view the credits.
    TitleScreenPanel
    Represents the title screen panel in the game interface.
    TitleScreenStartButton
    Represents the "Start" button on the title screen.
